title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 895.3 - Level playing field
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 895.3 - Level playing field

State Regulations

No municipality may award or renew a franchise for cable
television service which contains economic or regulatory burdens which when
taken as a whole are greater or lesser than those burdens placed upon another
cable television franchise operating in the same franchise
area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
895.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
